description: Ex-member of the Royal Intelligence Special Support Unit, Black Hawk, Fulle was a formidable soldier at a young age of 18. However, he longs to quit and has been working as a tavern dish-washer ever since. Fulle is a laid-back young man who is very much like Shannon (reliable, sometimes acts like an old man and fights often with Pacifica).
name: Fulle Takuto
